title: [minor] Brand particle theft bug
body:
I was playing no-skin Brand on coop and ran into cryo Brand bot.  Particle theft ensued, and we switched animation colors for our W.  

FYI, no biggie.

replies.body:
Hey EMeta! 

I'm pretty excited you called it particle theft and know what's going on here! ^-^ Thanks for the report - I'll look into this today.

**UPDATE:** I'm not able to repro this. :c Would you happen to have a video? If it's only occurring on your client, I may suggest a client repair - a file may have been jumbled with the last patch.
